description.originalText: Nicole can in with her calm demeanor and organizational skills that I needed. From there she got better and better, I pulled her on for more and more hours giving her more task and responsibilities. As a business owner I needed Nicole as my personal and executive assistant, she is also a good listener and creates systems where I didnâ€™t even realize I needed for my life to function better.

description.displayText: Nicole is a pillar that has kept my family and I stable through a terrible time in our lives. She is a highly professional and dynamic caregiver, sensing changes in my husband's needs even before I do. She makes proactive, but non-know-it-all suggestions to improve home conditions or medication management. Nicole instinctively knows when to step back and give the family time alone and when to engage. When she does engage, it is not just with the patient, but with the whole family-whoever needs her support, whether it's me, our 4yo, the dog, or my sick husband. Her communication style is developmentally appropriate, nurturing, and inquisitive-she is always trying to suss out everyone's needs and where she can be of use. Once she gets the groove of the house, she jumps in like double-Dutch, never needing to be told what to do. Her cooking is fabulous. Her heart is huge. Don't scroll past this magical lady.
